title: Determine rate constant from pesticide half-life

content.question: After a certain pesticide compound is applied to crops, its decomposition is a first-order reaction with a half-life of <math alttext="56" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>56</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> days. What is the rate constant, <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, for the decomposition reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.012 per day" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.012</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>day</mtext></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext=" 0.018 per day" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.018</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>day</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="56 per day" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>56</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>day</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="81 per day" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>81</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>day</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0.012 per day" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.012</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>day</mtext></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
